backend/main.mo: Motoko backend canister implementing user profiles, phone checks, and conversation/message storage with authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like mapping of frontend file paths to short functional summaries for documentation or tooling.
Markdown checklist outlining steps, verification, rollback, and troubleshooting for promoting a preview build to production.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes using a custom OKLCH color system.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component handling routing, authentication flow, section navigation, splash screen, and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with branding, section navigation, and authentication controls, adapting behavior based on user login state.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the Vibechat logo image with size options and falls back to text if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/CameraCaptureDia: Provides a dialog for capturing photos using the device camera, handling camera initialization, errors, and returning the captured file.
frontend/src/components/chat/Conversatio: Displays a conversation view with participant info, message timeline, and message composer, handling loading and back navigation.
Renders the user's conversations list with participant previews, loading/error states, and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Provides a text and media message composer with upload progress, WhatsApp sharing, and message sending logic.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageTime: Fetches and displays messages with attachments, timestamps, and auto-scrolling, handling loading and errors.
frontend/src/components/chat/NewConversa: Modal dialog for creating a new conversation by entering and validating a Principal ID.
frontend/src/components/ContactsSyncDial: Enables users to sync contacts via the Contacts Picker or manual input, match them with Vibechat users, and start chats with matched profiles.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDialog.ts: Empty placeholder file for a profile dialog component.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePhotoPick: Lets users upload or capture a profile photo, validating files and showing a preview before selection.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Shows a temporary splash screen with a fading animation and logo before the app loads.
frontend/src/components/videos/mockSpons: Defines the SponsoredVideoItem interface and provides mock sponsored video data.
frontend/src/components/videos/Sponsored: Shows a grid of sponsored video items with thumbnails and opens a viewer when an item is selected.
A modal video viewer that displays sponsored video content with simulated playback progress and details.
frontend/src/components/videos/useSimula: A hook that simulates video playback progress over time and triggers a completion callback.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppStyleAut: Implements a multi-step authentication flow including phone input, verification, and profile setup with photo upload.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profile operations, phone checks, and password management using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines theme variables for light and dark modes with a warm color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root, providing React Query and Internet Identity contexts around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/ChatsPage.tsx: Renders chat list and details with mobile-friendly navigation and a dialog for creating new conversations.
frontend/src/pages/GroupsPage.tsx: Displays a placeholder UI announcing that group features are coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero, features, and CTA sections using UI components and navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/pages/LivePage.tsx: Static placeholder page displaying a coming-soon message for live audio/video features.
frontend/src/pages/StatusPage.tsx: Static placeholder page showing a coming-soon message for disappearing status updates.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Videos page showing sponsored video feed and an informational alert about demo content.
frontend/src/utils/fileBytes.ts: Validates image files and reads them into Uint8Array for profile picture handling.
frontend/src/utils/phoneNumbers.ts: Utilities for normalizing, extracting, deduplicating phone numbers and detecting Contacts Picker support.
frontend/src/utils/readFileAsBytesAny.ts: Validates and reads image/video files into Uint8Array for message attachments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappShare.ts: Builds and opens WhatsApp web share URLs with prefilled text.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining themes, colors, fonts, container settings, plugins, and custom extensions.
project_state.json: Contains the current vibechat project state, including UI direction, architectural constraints, known issues, and tracked features. Also lists image requirements and version/deployment inconsistencies relevant to ongoing development.
